Module pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project
Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.application.controller

Class AgendaController

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.application.controller.AgendaController
public class AgendaController extends Object
Controller class for managing the agenda operations.

  • Method Details

    • registerAgendaEntry

      public Optional<AgendaEntry> registerAgendaEntry(int toDoEntryOption, Data starting_Date)
      Registers an entry in the agenda.
      Parameters:
      toDoEntryOption - The option of the to-do entry.
      starting_Date - The starting date for the entry.
      Returns:
      The registered agenda entry, if present.

    • postponeTask

      public boolean postponeTask(int agendaTaskID, Data postponeDate, AgendaEntry agendaEntry)
      Postpones a task.
      Parameters:
      agendaTaskID - The ID of the agenda task.
      postponeDate - The new date to postpone the task to.
      agendaEntry - The agenda entry to be postponed.
      Returns:
      true if the task was postponed successfully, false otherwise.

    • assignTeam

      public boolean assignTeam(int teamID, int agendaEntryID, String emailService, String responsible)
      Assigns a team to a task in the agenda.
      Parameters:
      teamID - The ID of the team.
      agendaEntryID - The ID of the agenda entry.
      emailService - The email service to be used.
      responsible - The responsible person's email.
      Returns:
      true if the team was assigned successfully, false otherwise.

    • requestColabTaskList

      public Optional<List<AgendaEntry>> requestColabTaskList(Collaborator collaborator, Data startDate, Data endDate, int filterSelection)
      Requests the list of tasks assigned to a collaborator.
      Parameters:
      collaborator - The collaborator whose tasks are to be retrieved.
      startDate - The start date of the task list.
      endDate - The end date of the task list.
      filterSelection - The filter selection.
      Returns:
      The list of tasks assigned to the collaborator.

    • requestPlannedColabTaskList

      public Optional<List<AgendaEntry>> requestPlannedColabTaskList(Collaborator collaborator, Data startDate, Data endDate, int filterSelection)
      Requests the list of planned tasks assigned to a collaborator.
      Parameters:
      collaborator - The collaborator whose tasks are to be retrieved.
      startDate - The start date of the task list.
      endDate - The end date of the task list.
      filterSelection - The filter selection.
      Returns:
      The list of planned tasks assigned to the collaborator.

    • requestChangedStatusTaskList

      public Optional<List<AgendaEntry>> requestChangedStatusTaskList(Collaborator collaborator, Data startDate, Data endDate, int filterSelection, String confirmation, int selectedTask)
      Requests the list of tasks with changed status assigned to a collaborator.
      Parameters:
      collaborator - The collaborator whose tasks are to be retrieved.
      startDate - The start date of the task list.
      endDate - The end date of the task list.
      filterSelection - The filter selection.
      confirmation - The confirmation status.
      selectedTask - The selected task ID.
      Returns:
      The list of tasks with changed status assigned to the collaborator.

    • requestPossiblePlannedColabTaskList

      public Optional<List<AgendaEntry>> requestPossiblePlannedColabTaskList(Collaborator collaborator, Data startDate, Data endDate, int filterSelection)
      Requests the list of possible planned tasks assigned to a collaborator.
      Parameters:
      collaborator - The collaborator whose tasks are to be retrieved.
      startDate - The start date of the task list.
      endDate - The end date of the task list.
      filterSelection - The filter selection.
      Returns:
      The list of possible planned tasks assigned to the collaborator.
